question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term refers to techniques like digital painting, digital application of color to hand-drawn art, and digital manipulation of images?
description: The image features a blue background with two large white letters in the center. The letters are "P" and "S," with the "P" being slightly larger than the "S." The font is bold and sans-serif, giving it a modern and clean appearance. The overall design is simple and minimalistic.
